title: (46192) Montserrat - 1B Avinguda Blasco Ibáñez
description: Large municipal parking. partly uneven, upper part flat enough to sleep well. Quiet between 11pm and 6.30am (street traffic ahead).

title: (46192) Montserrat - 22 Carrer Metge Manuel Llombart
description: Fresh drinking water, push button tap with a smooth end. It is in the children's play area 10 metres from the road side which has ample parking.

title: (46192) Valencia - 52A Plaça Poligono Numero 15
description: Large quiet car park with no house around next to the Montserrat cemetery.

title: (46192) Real de Montroi - 18H Plaça Poligono Numero 13
title_short: (46192) Real de Montroi - 18H Plaça Poligono Numero 13
description: The end of this off-road street, as the bamboo hangs over the whole street. Access from the gravel works. You can also park further up the path (e.g. under the large trees). There are no cars driving through. A jogger rarely came by.

title: (46192) Montserrat - 972 Plaça Poligono Numero 13
description: Nature corner to rest quietly.

title: (46194) Real - 47 CV-50
description: Small parking walk along river opposite there is steep gravel path that takes you into the hills ,there is no services just pit stop jump in river over night parking nor suitable for large motorhome

title: (46192) Montserrat - 131 Diseminado Poligon 1
description: El Clot de les Tortugues picnic area. old picnic area with stone tables. hiking trails. on weekends there are many people but the night is quiet

title: (46388) Godelleta - 3A Calle Lugo-calicanto B
description: Alameda esplanade. Land space next to the river. We spent the night in the middle of July alone. Not many mosquitoes. A bit of music noise, but it was Saturday.

title: (46195) Llombai - 42 Plaça Poligono 19
description: Small recreational area with picnic areas. Ideal for one stop access by dirt lane.

title: (46389) Turís - 11 Carretera Silla-Turís Cc.3322
description: Good for dump & refill water. also to overnight.

title: (46220) Lloma de la Verge - 1 Urbanitzacio Lloma la Verge,Ametller
title_short: (46220) Lloma de la Verge - 1 Urbanitzacio Lloma la Verge,Ametller
description:
Chalet aislado con facil acceso para vehículos grandes. Amplio jardín y piscina para descansar de los largos trayectos.
Familia acogedora te ayudara a disfrutar de tu viaje por Valencia

title: (46220) Torrent - 140B Diseminado Poligon 5
description: Service station A7 motorway direction Valencia-Alicante. Restaurant and cafe with shower open 24 hours a day.

title: (46900) Torrent - 30 Carrer Toll-l'Alberca Calle B
description: Quiet on street parking, just off motorway. Frequented by long distance lorry drivers for thier overnight stops. There is an Aldi, a fuel station and a McDonalds within 50mts. Fairly level so no need for ramps.

title: (46900) Torrent - 17 Carrer Toll-l'Alberca Calle B
description: Parking of a shopping center which houses a nightclub. The neighborhood has several places with parked truckers.

title: (46389) Turís - 45A Avenida Blasco Ibáñez
description: Laundry la colada, you can park well on parallel streets, we have a pharmacy and bars nearby. good price. They open from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.

title: (46900) Torrent - 47F CV-4115
description: Parking with shade, quiet and with a source of drinking water. This source is only for the inhabitants of the city.

title: (46900) Torrent - 4-6 Travesía Rosendo Montoro
description: Leisure area, small tables ... With bathrooms and water. Ideal for eating. Playground for children. There is not much room for parking. Narrow streets.

title: (46220) Picassent - 118 Disseminat Polígon 38
description: Parking area, near the Mercadona, a quiet place, near the exit to the A7 and V31, nearby there is a field where you can take the dogs.

title: (46229) Picassent - 4 Camino de la Paridera
description: Just at the entrance of the city. Lots of space and quite calm.

title: (46900) Torrent - 4 Carrer de Fernando Furió Roca
title_short: (46900) Torrent - 4 Carrer de Fernando Furió Roca
description: Left the vehicle here to go to Valencia by metro. Everything went fine

title: (46370) -
description: Perfect parking day and night, next to the gas station, with services, bar.

title: (46370) Chiva - 245 Plaça Numero 17
description: Repsol gas station with water and air machine. Right next to it there is a parking for cars and exchange is and a restaurant open 24 hours

title: (46900) Torrent - 5 Carrer Gaspar Navarro Piles
description: Laundromat, 2 machines, two dryers. WiFi zone. By cons try to park on the avenue because many cars parked in the street. Works with Euros. Possibility of changing tickets into coins. Located behind the National Polícia police station.

title: (46900) Torrent - 11 Calle Prolongación Carlet
description: It is a normal car park but we have been struck by the large number of playgrounds in the area. This town, Torrent, is marked as a town dedicated to childhood. It is full of parks, there are bars and restaurants with areas for children, they have circuses and fairs frequently because of what you see, etc. Ideal to stop or spend the night with children to take their breaks on long trips. We have been great

title: (46290) Alcàsser - 3 Carrer dels Velluters
description: Almost in the town center. Supermarket and wheels close to spot.

title: (46900) Torrent - 4 Calle Escultor Vicente Pallardo
description: Large parking lot may be noisy as close to busy roads. We stayed only for lunch but there is no ban on staying there at night.

title: (46394) Ribarroja de Turia - 13 Carrer I
description: We searched a lot and it is the only gas station we found that had showers. They are 3 euros, they give you the keys and it is a single shower bathroom away from the gas station. It is quite clean.

title: (46394) Ribarroja de Turia - 2 Calle Oliveral-Q
description: Ample dirt parking, industrial zone, but very quiet

title: (46394) Ribarroja de Turia - 17 Calle M
description: Large, free, public car park in the industrial area. At a gas station nearby you can also take a shower for a fee.

title: (46450) Benifaió - 9 Plaça Poligono 13
description: Gas station with parking. It has a drinking water source, public toilets and the possibility of showers for a fee.

title: (46970) Alaquàs - 95 Carretera Pla de Quart
description: Self-service laundry, gas station and plenty of parking.

title: (46240) Carlet - 21 Plaza Perfecto García Chorne
description: Parking in a sports car area but taking advantage of the space in the planter, there is room for a 7-person motorhome. We called the Local Police and they told us that there was no municipal ordinance prohibiting overnight stays in the municipality . 20 minutes from downtown. Quiet area to spend the night. Nice church in the town.

title: (46369) Alborache - Camino Molino Galán
description: Starting point for a very light route with children. Depending on the moment you can find quite a lot of garbage on the way, it is a shame because it is quite beautiful. We sleep alone and very quiet. For camper, narrow access.

title: (46930) Quart de Poblet - 8 Carrer Pessebret
description: Parking of the Bonaire shopping center. You can park and use restrooms. Very nice people. Restaurants, leisure area, shopping center... in the center's dependency it has bathrooms, unlimited Wi-Fi, power outlets, all free. Sunday service does not work.

title: (46369) Alborache - 4D Calle Lepanto
description: Quite inexpensive self-service laundry, it is next to a pharmacy and 10 meters from the Consum where you can park, buy and do your laundry.

title: (46460) Silla - 22-94 Avenida de Gandía
description: Sports complex car park. the chair municipal poliesportiu has free hot showers.. go to the pavilion and ask for them.

title: (46230) Alginet - 106 Carrer Major
description: Flat parking lot with fine sand and trees on the outskirts of town. There are no services. Opposite there is a children's play area.

title: (46970) Alaquàs - s/n Carrer Pablo Iglesias
description: New parking, only for not very large vans, that are not more than 210 meters high. Close to supermarket and garden area with picnic tables. Very quiet. The town has a beautiful 16th century castle that can be visited. Good combination of metro bus to reach the center of Valencia in 10 minutes. There are no services.

title: (46960) Aldaia - C. Centro Comercial Bonaire
description: We spent the night parked at the bottom of the parking lot. Tranquility 7 am workers begin to come shopping center. Ideal to stock up and eat and continue the route.

title: (46460) Silla - 7 Calle de Jaime I el Conquistador
title_short: (46460) Silla - 7 Calle de Jaime I el Conquistador
description: Large lot for parking and at night. There are no services.

address.street: 7 Calle de Jaime I el Conquistador

title: (46460) Silla - 4 Calle en Proyecto N.10
description: Large free parking

title: (46380) Cheste - 22 Carretera Cheste-Chiva
description: Parking sports complex good for spending a night or two. Pleasant, quiet village center nearby.

title: (46230) Alginet - 188 Carrer Trullas
description: GPL LPG service station, very nice, you have to have your own adapter. no problem filling the tank

title: (46460) Silla - 50 Carrer de Sant Roc
description: Automatic laundry, opening 365 days / year.

title: (46460) Silla - 9 Avinguda Beniparrell
description: Vacant land, not yet built HLM property. No service

title: (46198) Caserío Salto de Milláres - Mirador de la llacuna
title_short: (46198) Caserío Salto de Milláres - Mirador de la llacuna
description: Area for about five vans in the middle of nature. It has a couple of picnic tables. No services. Some unevenness. The road to get there is quite good and has small sections of land but without problem. We have come up with vans and a great volume. All perfect.

title: (46469) Beniparrell - 47 Carrer les Escoles
description: Public parking, open all day. In front of the sports center of the city. The sports center has a bar, a source of drinking water.

title: (46360) Buñol - 359 Plaça Numero 16
description: Paid day parking . Walk to waterfall and starting point of several hiking trails.

title: (46970) Alaquàs - 35 Carrer Sant Joan de Ribera
title_short: (46970) Alaquàs - 35 Carrer Sant Joan de Ribera
description: Parking

title: (46200) Paiporta - 48G Carrer Marqués del Turia
description: Quiet area on the outskirts of Paiporta in public parking.

title: (46460) Silla - 99B Polígono Número 30
description: Old eras of rice fields that are no longer used very close to the town behind a covered pool near a pipican and 500m from the port of Silla, corresponding to the Albufera natural area the great dates are March, April and May in June, July and august crazy hot in september hustle and bustle of tractors for the harvest autumn and winter a walk through the rice fields with the sun is also good

title: (46960) Aldaya - 66 Polígono Número 24
description: Plot of land, there are always cars, trucks and some motorhome parked.

title: (46370) Chiva - 65 Urbanización Vista Alegre
description: Some shade, tables to eat, grill, flat dirt and gravel floor, some walker with dog, per week at night, a car arrives and they leave soon, easy to get in and out, squirrels in the pines that shade the tables .

title: (46240) Carlet - 37 Avinguda de Vicent Andrés Estellés
title_short: (46240) Carlet - 37 Avinguda de Vicent Andrés Estellés
description: Public parking, we had a good night, bar in front, teenage sea at 600metres, police at 500 meters. Quiet.

title: (46360) Buñol -
description: Excellent parking to see the town and water routes, you can stay since we asked the police for permission and they told us there was no problem, it is next to the Sports Pavilion.

title: (46970) Alaquàs - 2 Avinguda General Palafox
description: A parking lot in Alaquás park There is space for a grill

title: (46360) Buñol - 18 Avenida de la Música
description: Free parking near the center. Ideal for stopping during the day and also at night because it is a street with little traffic. In the immediate vicinity there is a park for dogs to run, the Mercadona supermarket and differentiated garbage bins.

title: (46210) Picanya - 36 Carrer Mariana Pineda
description: Casual parking in urban area VERY GREEN AREA, trees, lawn, ...... bike lane. Very quiet and SAFE semi-detached housing area. Large parking area and very empty of vehicles. Just behind it is a very large grocery store (open Monday to Saturday from 9:00 a.m. to 9:30 p.m.). There is a fountain in the grassy area, you can catch some water. You have a bike lane in front of you that connects the entire municipality, very fun ... route with a bicycle or scooter, RECOMMENDATION: Visit orchard houses (Calle Orihuela) ....... the town is small, about 11,000 inhabitants. You have the metro station at the end of the avenue. You go down the stairs and go under the bridge to access where you buy tickets. Very close to the motorway exit... put in GPS: Av Sanchis Guarner, behind the covered municipal swimming pool. You can enter in GPS: - Av Sanchís Guarner 28 (just behind the indoor pool) It is a beautiful area of a quiet town. In summer you can take the table and chairs out to the lawn for DINNER (The residents of the area usually do it, the Local Police allow it). Very very clean and very safe town. PLACES TO EAT/DINE: -Peanflo (Plaza Mayor) -La Seu (Picanya sports center, food only). -The Crank (Avenida l'Horta). *In summer I recommend having a horchata (a typical Valencian fresh drink, it is a very small horchateria, just a bar to serve) It is located in the Plaza del País Valenciano, near the Peanflo. **OPEN ONLY IN MAY- JUNE - JULY - AUGUST -SEPTEMBER

title: (46960) Aldaya - 7 Calle de Don Juan de Austria
title_short: (46960) Aldaya - 7 Calle de Don Juan de Austria
description: It has taken a lot of work and effort, but we can already say that it is open! We are at your disposal, in case there are vehicles from Valencia in the group, it may be of interest to you. Covered Parking of new creation. In closed ship, with video surveillance, concrete floor.  Motorhomes, Quad, Comanche, etc. With good access and close to V-30, A-3, A-7, near the airport, 7 km from Valencia, with a bus stop and next to CC Bonaire. The services to be offered: Emptying gray and black water Video surveillance and alarm connected to the alarm center Air compressor Drinking water Safe Light Automatic door Fire fighting system Single entry for customers. Toilets 24 hour service. Prices depend on the measurements of the vehicle.

address.street: 7 Calle de Don Juan de Austria

title: (46360) Buñol - 34B Carretera Godelleta
description: Quiet place to spend the night, even to leave the caravan parked and go alone with the car

title: (46369) Yátova - 74 Diseminado P001
description: Nice spacious place below the parking lot of Cueva de las Palomas. garbage cans available. Toilet & showers are available in the parking lot (cold water in January)

title: (46470) Catarroja - 20 Avinguda Generalitat Valenciana
description: Laundry with very convenient access at the same gas station.

title: (46440) Almussafes - 15 Carrer Poliesportiu
description: A peaceful place. Gym with showers. The swimming pools next door. Polideporrivo. Consumer supermarket with bathrooms. 2 minutes from the city center. A city well known for its concerts and cultural activities.

title: (46440) Almussafes - 20 Carrer Tarick l'Almanzafi
description: Slept one night here with no problems. Silent. good for those passing by and in need of a place to rest

name: Zona de acampada Cueva de las Palomas
title: (46367) Zona de acampada Cueva de las Palomas
title_short: (46367) Zona de acampada Cueva de las Palomas
description: Pigeon Cave Campsite (Yatova). Great quiet place (at least a-worth) to visit in an area surrounded by swimming pools, caves and waterfalls following the marked routes. The parking lot is spacious and has enough space. Access is a bit narrow so NOT RECOMMENDED FOR BIG MOTOCYCLETTES, but vans or large volumes, no problem. There are toilets, sinks and a barbecue area. There are also places to get rid of trash. Please use!

title: (46190) Ribarroja de Turia - 6 Polígono Diseminados
description: Clean and quiet place for spend the night. Near the Airport and town.

title: (46940) Manises - 31 Polígon el Comptat 3
description: Right behind Valencia Airport. Plenty of parking space. Up to truck size. Intermittent noise from take-off and landing aircraft. But is limited. Otherwise very calm.

title: (46367) Yátova - 102 Diseminado P005
description: Parking access to the Cueva de las Palomas. A small car park 1min from the cave. Near Yátova Camping Area

title: (46360) Buñol - 7 Plaza Ventas
description: Self service laundry. 2 washers, 1 dryer. Paid parking outside for cars. Park at train station for free it is a 4 minute walk. washing smells lovely.

title: (46960) Aldaia - 58 Plaça Numero 14
description: Gas station with the possibility of washing your motorhome. It does not have a balcony to clean the roof but the man from the gas station has left me a ladder and I have been able to wash it from above. Also, if you are accompanied, you can use the 2 hoses/guns that are on the sides simultaneously. The price of diesel is very good too. Saturday night and Sunday night does not close at night. The other days at 9:30 they remove the hoses.

title: (46470) Massanassa - 1D Carrer de l'Alqueria de Soria
title_short: (46470) Massanassa - 1D Carrer de l'Alqueria de Soria
description: Land parking near Valencia, quiet location. We spent one night. Little noise

title: (46360) Buñol - 2D Camino Piscina
description: Paved area for 2-3 vehicles. Source with water in the proximity. Very quiet place next to the river. Lunch park. 5 min walk from the center of Buñol

title: (46440) Almussafes - 2 Ronda Historiador Lluís Duart Àlaba
title_short: (46440) Almussafes - 2 Ronda Historiador Lluís Duart Àlaba
description: Large quiet parking area at night

title: (46360) Buñol - 22 Avenida Pérez Galdós
description:
Small plot with busses and cars parked, no signs. 
5 min walk to the town. A bit noisy as it's next to the road but was useful for the stay.

title: (46950) Xirivella - 17 Calle Sector Sgzv-pg 6
description: Parking area next to the Teaching Institute. Near train stop that takes you to the center of Valencia. Supermarkets nearby.

title: (46940) Manises - 8 Carrer de Sedavi
description: Area near the airport, in a polygon of Manises, you can rest and you have the Madrid road close by

title: (46014) Valencia - Unnamed road
description: Good starting point to visit Valencia. It is a parking and metro space. You can also stay overnight there. If noise disturbs your sleep, don't stay here.

title: (46360) Buñol - 272 Plaça Numero 18
description: Roadside drinking water fountain with powerful jet and enough space to stop (even for large vehicles).

title: (46910) Alfafar - 10 Carrer Joanot Martorell
description: Temporary parking space at Alfafar town hall, adjoining Masanassa near the IKEA I industrial park, quiet and safe bus to the Center dr Valencia 1 minute walk

title: (46930) Quart de Poblet - 78 Avinguda Reial Monestir Santa Mar
title_short: (46930) Quart de Poblet - 78 Avinguda Reial Monestir Santa Mar
description: Free municipal parking

title: (46940) Manises - 8 Carrer dels Esports
description: Parking in front of a stadium and in front of the buildings. The stadium has a nice cafe and a very clean toilet. I think for a quiet night, or when you have to go to the airport which is a few minutes away. For the airport car parks, there must be, according to the information I had, the P3 car park, P4 car park, and P6 car park, accessible to the motorhomes.

title: (46367) Yátova - 1A Carrer Bco Tonau
description: Ample parking attached to a large park, spacious and with a fountain. Bar a few meters from a quiet and permissive town with motorhomes.

title: (46940) Manises - 6 Calle Vicente Calatrava
description: Near the Valencia metro "Rosas", near the pedestrian crossing to the airport, 5 'walk. Commercial area with supermarket, restaurants and bars. lots of cars and roadside ... not comfortable to sleep.

title: (46940) Manises - 6 Carrer dels Sants Just i Pastor
title_short: (46940) Manises - 6 Carrer dels Sants Just i Pastor
description: Automatic laundry, not very good for parking

address.street: 6 Carrer dels Sants Just i Pastor

title: (46950) Chirivella - 69 Avenida de la Constitució
description: Wide open field with constantly parked cars. To spend a night it is fine and quiet

title: (46940) La Presa - 12 Partida la Presa
description: Very quiet place to spend a night near the A-7. In front there is a small abandoned church. Near the railway line and the airport. You can hear an airplane passing by, although at night for traffic. Highly recommended.

title: (46198) Dos Aguas - 6 Calle Proyecto 3
description: Parking next to the Dos Aguas pool. Quiet area to spend the night. In wild nature. There are tables and a path to walk.

title: (46360) Buñol - 293 Plaça Numero 18
description: Nice little spot, more privat than the other onese in the area. Down the Road 500 meters, is a drinking water fountain. Excellent views and really peaceful. In the town on Buñol, 1 km away, theres several shops, including a Lidl! Bumby steep Road, take Care. Not suited for a Big AC. Down below the parking theres a river, when we were here, in january, the water was clear and shallow- makes for a good swim! Also many friendly  Ibex goats here.

title: (46198) Dos Aguas - 12 Carretera Dos Aguas
description: Very quiet pitch at the cemetery of Dos Aguas with beautiful views.

title: (46930) Cuart de Poblet - 17 Plaza Cortes Valencianas
title_short: (46930) Cuart de Poblet - 17 Plaza Cortes Valencianas
description: Plenty of plane during the day, less at night. Right next to a perfect skate park, better than those in Barcelona for connoisseurs. No water nearby.

title: (46940) Manises - 16 Carrer Molí de la Llum
title_short: (46940) Manises - 16 Carrer Molí de la Llum
description: Automatic laundromats

title: (46940) Manises - 20 Calle Montepio
description: This place is on the side of a police station and 5 minutes from metro station Manises. Considering the huge numbers of thefts in Valência, this place is the only safe option to visit the city. Stayed for 2 nights and went to Valência by day with no problem. It is not a pretty place, but does the job.

title: (46360) Buñol - 310 Plaça Numero 18
description: Small spot for maximum 3 vans.

title: (46198) Millares - Vía Pista
description: Beautiful place to spend the night leaving Millares, quiet track without any noise and very beautiful views. The only downside is that there are many wasps and flies that will not let you eat outside the motorhome at least in September. Otherwise great.

title: (46017) València - 1D Calle Pai la Torre
description: Quiet parking lot. Lots of room all year round. It is on the outskirts of Valencia. There is a park with several fountains nearby. RV wash nearby. LIDL supermarket where you can park your car to buy 3 min. Public transport 5 minutes away which takes you to the center in 15 minutes. Consume 10 min walk. And all kinds of services on Av Real de Madrid, where there is a bakery, a hardware store, a pharmacy... it's a main street. You also have right next to this car park, a cycle path that takes you throughout the city of Valencia.

name: Bodega 2020
title: (46680) Bodega 2020
description: We are happy to welcome you in the parking lot of our tasting room. Our car park is an ideal stopover for wine lovers/campers. You can taste our house wines and tapas every day of the week. Free night with the purchase of 6 bottles. Arrival between 12:00 p.m. and 5:30 p.m. We speak Dutch, German, English, French and Spanish. Large campers (>9m) are also welcome. Reservations preferably via whatsapp or email. Saturday and Sunday we are closed!

title: (46198) Dos Aguas - CV-580
description: It is a small picnic area next to the Júcar river. It is very good to spend the night if you are passing through the area. It is next to the road but you can sleep peacefully. In the morning many motorcycles and cyclists pass by. It is not to spend the day but it is fine to sleep.

title: (46940) La Presa - 105 Carrer del Lliri
description: Nice and calm place near a river. with a kids playground and a park. in the morning people walk or drive by.

title: (46360) Buñol - 323 Plaça Numero 18
description: Climbing area. very calm. little place. views to buñol.

title: (46910) Valencia - 5I Calle Sector 1 Ab
description: Ikea carpark, surface carpark has no height limit. Felt very safe leaving the van for a day out in Valencia centre. Massanassa train station 10 mins walk, 10 mins travel time and 3.50euros return. Ikea toilets, cafes and free WiFi - (coffee free with Ikea family card). Small play park across road near entrance. Very cheap fuel station which you will walk past between the parking and train station. (Oct 2019 - E1.06 per litre for diesel.)

title: (46198) Dos Aguas - Calle de Vicente Gimeno Palau
title_short: (46198) Dos Aguas - Calle de Vicente Gimeno Palau
description: Large flat plain on the edge of Dos Aguas, where we spent the night very quiet. There is a place where mud can accumulate, but when it is dry there is no problem. For us it was a better option than the cemetery. Open, no prohibition signs or private property.

title: (46940) Manises - 104 Plaça Num 7
description: Parking at the edge of a very uncrowded street, in the middle of a sports center. we spent one night before going to the airport, 5 minutes by camper.

title: (46940) Manises - 190 Plaça Num 7
description: New motorhome area in Manises. There are about 4 or 5 parking spaces. Draining of gray, black and filling with clean water. Recycling containers. The perfect place to get to know the city of ceramics, its gastronomy and a few meters from the Turia river park. Many thanks to the council for this installation.

title: (46198) Millares - CV-580
description: Picnic area close to the road (but not much traffic) with beautiful views! It is really quiet. If you are lucky you see deers hopping around. There are a few benches and bins (no other services) It was a pleasure to wake up in this place. It would be great if we leave no trace (so also no toilet paper) so we can all keep enjoying this place! Enjoy!

title: (46910) Alfafar - 4A Calle Profesora Ana Rojo
description: Simple location, no service. Trash cans nearby. There is plenty of parking on the side streets and businesses open around 8 a.m.

title: (46910) Alfafar - 29 Carrer Rabisancho
description: Gas station with water station, car wash and very friendly service

title: (46910) Alfafar - 30 Avinguda de la Albufera
description: Laundry. Tumble dryer

title: (46910) Alfafar - 108 Poligono 14
description: Water Tap, Municipal Drinking Water for Children's Play Park, Good Pressure, Not threaded but suitable for a "Water Theif ^TM" or rubber adapters. Tapside parking accessible for 10mt. hose.

title: (46920) Mislata - 20 Calle Braç dels Horts
description: Municipal space for parking. Gravel and dust. Mislata is a very densely populated town. Difficult access with a long motorhome.

title: (46470) València - 350B Plaça Numero 10
description: Good place to spend a quiet night although at the beginning there was movement of cars. Right in front of the parking lot there is a hiking path and in the mornings you can see people cycling or walking.

title: (46198) - 39 Diseminado Diseminados
description: It is the parking lot of the Millares cemetery. Very quiet, with trash can. We have spent one night. Two climbing campers spent the night with us. It is very close to the town so you can walk. And it is a good starting point for the excursion to Castillet and El Monstruo Waterfall.

title: (46950) Chirivella - 1C Calle Veinticinco Abril
description: Small free parking right next to a mall, it has about 20 spaces, but there is usually room. There is a coin operated laundry right next door.

title: (46017) València - 79 Plaça Num 141 Res Urb
description: Parking next to the very large cemetery but without services. A half hour walk from the city of sciences and the city center. In general quiet at night although there is a road next to which cars pass throughout the night.

title: (46014) València - 1B Carrer dels Traginers
description: Carwash place (self service with pressure lancet) including one place for larger vehicles like motorhome including a ladder to wash the vehicle from above. Price see pictures. There is also a water source for customers (low pressure, need syphon to fill canister, see also picture) and vacuum.

title: (46014) València - 2122 Carrer de Vicent Clavel
description: Many streets have parking along the side. You need to have a little bit of luck to get a spot but it is free. Could be hard for big campervans though. Parked here to get to the climbing gym 200m away.

title: (46014) València - 2115 Carrer de Vicent Clavel
description: Big dusty free parking. Entrance is from the road with gas station. 40minutes to centre

title: (46014) València - 11 Carrer del Ceramista Ros
description: Laundromat "Washlab"

title: (46920) Valencia - 8A Sc Quint II
description: Large parking area. Next to a funeral home but no problem, just people walking dogs and the noise of planes landing but very acceptable. Great to visit Valencia by bike, 5 minutes from the head of the Turia park. Supermarkets nearby, all quiet

title: (46014) València - 6 Carrer dels Campaners
description: Went to the climbing gym. There is free wifi with the code naturalclimbingvalencia and showers if you go climbing. There are a lot of parking spots around and if you are lucky to find one you are safe to spend the night. They said it is safe to stay here

title: (46920) Valencia - 1A Sc Quint II
description:
A huge asphalt parking lot with fencing, barriers and security cameras. parking is free and the barriers open as you approach them. 2.5m height restriction. The police academy is next to it and presume the students park here so must be safe. No bays for motorhomes but no prohibition sign either and plenty of space.
A short pleasant walk through top of park to get to the zoo.

title: (46182) La Canyada - 168A Carrer 15
description: We spent a quiet night in this parking lot in a residential area. No service for motorhomes but the parking lot is big enough even for a large motorhome.

title: (46920) Valencia - 1P Sc Quint II
description: Very large parking lots. They are usually calm. Nearby to access by bike or walking to the old riverbed of Valencia.

title: (46368) Macastre - 103 Plaça Numero 08
description: Isolated place where you can eat or spend the day in peace (or take a nap) as today is a holiday, everything was crowded in Buñol, so we decided to find a quiet place. This has been perfect. There are fountains, tables and benches, and shade where to leave the van.

title: (46910) Sedaví - 7001 Plaça Numero 4
description: Gpl

title: (46370) Chiva - 2 CV-382
description: Gravel parking lot next to a kart racing track

title: (46018) València - 56 Carrer de Josep Maestre
description: Large parking lot in the residential zone, it seems safe. There are lots of green areas, some with benches. near the local "mercado", subway 5 minutes walk, center of town 30 minutes walk. 14.12.21 the above is true, except for security: our mobile home was broken into in broad daylight.

title: (46017) València - 25B Carrer del Litògraf Pascual i Abad

description: Faucet to load the van/motorhome and unload grey. It is next to the car wash machine.

title: (46014) València - 661 Carrer de Vicent Clavel
description: Parking 40 minutes from city centre. Stay 2 nights without problem

title: (46920) Mislata - 4C Carrer d' Almenars
description: Parking just behind the BIOPARC (7 minutes walk from this place to the door of the Bioparc), it is a gravel lot in the middle of buildings, a place that the neighbors use to park, it is spacious and has an infinite number of bars and restaurants around it, 1 minute walk there is a sports center where there are many trees (on weekends many people go to eat outdoors) and a park for children, next to the sports center is the Mislata health center that also has a large parking lot and also there is an indoor pool.

title: (46920) Mislata - 2P Sc Quint II
description: Tarmac parking without services where you can spend the day and night in peace. The local police do their rounds during the day. 15 mins walk from the friendly town center and 6 km from Valence.

title: (46920) Mislata - 32 Carrer Sèquia de Favara
description: A quiet street for a city visit and a night. Best during the holidays and festivals.

title: (46026) València - 54 Carrer del Guadalquivir
description:
Parking next to Street in industry district.
I slept here for one calm night with no police problem or other type of peolpe.

title: (46190) Ribarroja de Turia - 116 Carretera de Vilamarxant
title_short: (46190) Ribarroja de Turia - 116 Carretera de Vilamarxant
description: Laundry, 14kg at 4 euros, 19kg at 6 euros and dryers 17 kg at 2 euros, the washing machines put the soap and softener on them.

title: (46014) València - 57 Carrer de Fontanars dels Alforins
title_short: (46014) València - 57 Carrer de Fontanars dels Alforins
description: Location next to a park in one of the least exploited tourist areas of Valencia. It is worth having lunch in the Plaza de Patraix.

title: (46269) Tous - CV-5412
description: Small parking lot with great views of the coast ..

title: (46980) Paterna - 27 Carrer de les Roses
description: Small public parking; there is usually room at night. Right in front of the National Police station. They let you spend the night, several of the policemen there are users of motorhomes and campers. It has some slant. Only Campers fit, but motorhome can be parked nearby. There are no services.

title: (46017) Valencia - Calle Fernandez Mesa
description: Non-potable water source.

title: (46026) València - 117B Plaça Num 155 Res Urb
description: Good place very close to La Fe hospital.

title: (46430) Sollana - 103 Plaça Numero 25
description: Nice quiet spot at the edge of a small town. There are three long parking bays at the side of a less travelled road.

title: (46035) València - 82 Avinguda Pío Baroja
description: Free parking spaces ideal for visiting Bioparc. The local police are 20 meters away so you feel safe. There is a shopping center 200 meters away which is also very convenient. Ideal for campervans

title: (46026) València - 1413 Calle Pai Malilla Norte
description: A super quiet place, and with a 30 minute walk you are in the center, otherwise with a bus, (8) with a few stops. To visit Valencia is great.

title: (46035) València - 21 Calle Barranco
description: Free parking 24h. Guarded with city hall cameras.

title: (46191) Vilamarxant - 35 Plaça Diseminados
description: Large parking in recreational area. Quiet and beautiful place in nature to spend the day and night. Area with barbecue, bar, garbage containers and drinking water.

title: (46035) València - 506 Avinguda de Pío Baroja
description: Small parking in earth at 30 minutes from the old town, by bike. Easy access even with a big motorhome. Right in front of the Suma gas station.

title: (46190) Riba-roja de Túria -
description: Area of Riba-roja de Túria. Next to the river and under the bridge. Little conditioned but spacious and comfortable. Without services, even if they are going to put water. There is always a camper, at least. Toilet service neat little.

title: (46015) València - 6D Partida Arriba
description: Drinking water source in the Valencian garden, among farmers' houses. Good pressure, it is not threaded and has a push button. Easy access with the Ac or camper and enough space to momentarily park it upside down or backside and fill the tank with a hose.

title: (46004) València - 39 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi
title_short: (46004) València - 39 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi

address.street: 39 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi

title: (46988) Paterna - 2P Carrer de l'Algepser
description: At the Paterna gas station you can fill up water for 5 minutes for 1 euro. Attention water not drinkable but very useful if it is just for showers.

title: (46430) Sollana - 9 Polígono Número 29
description: Service station with toilets. It has an inflator and a free drinking water dispenser together, in front of the laundry room.

title: (46026) València - 44T Carrer de Bernat Descoll
description: Good parking day/night without being far from the center and without paying

title: (46988) Paterna - 2P Carrer del Corretger
description: Wide street cut off only by freight trucks from the nearby Carrefour. A lot of space to park and very spacious, next to the large Táctica park, ideal for a good walk with children and pets. Super quiet and next to a low cost gas station and a Burger King. Near an industrial estate on the outskirts of Paterna. 10 'from Valencia. Leaving the street towards the gas station, on the left there is a fountain easily accessible with the camper or motorhome.

title: (46004) València - 60 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi
title_short: (46004) València - 60 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi
description: Laundromat available: 3 washing machines, 2 dryers. Works with 1euro coins, a money changer is available.

address.street: 60 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi

title: (46035) Valencia - 12 Plaza Camporrobles
description: Gravel ground without installation. Ideal for the day. Not tested at night. Metro 5 min walk. Near the highway. Free!

title: (46026) Valencia - 16 Camino Molino de la Fonteta
title_short: (46026) Valencia - 16 Camino Molino de la Fonteta
description:
New area of housing developments in the Malilla neighborhood, an expanding neighborhood with large open fields and long, wide streets with plenty of parking space. Quiet and safe place at night. A small park and the La Fe Polytechnic hospital next door.
The best way to get to the center of Valencia is bus line 8 or taxi, since the nearest metro stop is far away (Jesús metro, 35 min. walk).

title: (46013) València - 12 Carrer de José Siurana
description: Automatic washing machines

title: (46988) Paterna - 65 Carrer del Corretger
description: Drinking water source at one of the entrances to the Tactical park. Easy access with the camper or motorhome, you have to go up the sidewalk and bring the vehicle as close as possible to the tree behind the fountain to counteract the steep slope of the ground. It is not threaded and has a push button.

title: (46015) Valencia -
description: Automatic laundry, small but just opened and is very clean. Two washing machines of 10 kg and a machine of 20 kg. Two dryers of 20 kg.

title: (46035) Valencia - 28 Calle del Maestro Bagant

title: (46183) L'Eliana - 2J Arrabal Sector SUZR-1
description: Residential area facing the forest between Eliana and Canada. For van or van. No prohibition. Close to the metro. Be careful, it is residential, so be discreet.

title: (46026) València - 71 Carrer de L'Illa Cabrera
description: Washing of parts 2x12kg, 2 dryers. Parking just in front.

title: (46026) València - 46 Avinguda d'Ausiàs March
description: Laundry service. Fastest was in 38 minutes. Includes coin changer.

title: (46006) Valencia - C. de les Filipines
description: Paid parking (blue limit) for a maximum of 2 hours. Ideal for a short city tour. I felt safe there without fear of the camper being broken into.

title: (46008) Valencia - 13 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic
title_short: (46008) Valencia - 13 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic

address.street: 13 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic

title: (46989) Paterna - 27B Carrer Carlina
description: Level land area, if it rains some puddles form. Quiet place in a residential area. Supermarket very close.

title: (46035) València - 44 Carrer de Favanella
description: A super quiet place with plenty of parking on the outskirts of Valencia to spend a night, bus 62 takes you to the center, stop 100 meters away.

title: (46980) Paterna - 43 Carrer Melissa
description: Parking day and night in Valterna area, there are several parking lots in this area, there are always several motorhomes parked. at night it is very quiet and if you arrive well on time there is always room, a little tilted if parked at the end.

title: (46013) València - 18 Carrer de Sollana
description: Free parking in the residential area. 30 minutes to the center

title: (46013) València - 1 Calle Magallanes
description: Public parking with spaces with good depth to park without services. Near City of Arts. We spent two nights without problems.

title: (46013) Valencia - 15 Avinguda dels Germans Maristes
description: Parking area for any type of vehicle. Big and small ones. In front of the pavilion of the fountain of San Luis (la fonteta). We went to the oceanografic by bus although you can walk if you are not with small children. The bus is 13 and then 95.

title: (46001) València - 36 Avinguda de l'Oest
description: Parking garage suitable for vans. Height limit 2.2 m, wide parking bays up to 5.5 m in length possible. No overnight stay

title: (46980) Paterna - 37 Carrer Orenga
description: Laundry

title: (46100) Burjasot - 15 Avinguda dels Esports
description: Parking next to the gym, you are a little less central than the parking of palm trees but it is true that it is also more saturated, there is noise of the subway passing by and from a road but in our case this was not embarrassing, we came here sent by the local Police

title: (46035) València - 5 Carrer Preseguer
description: A place to spend a night, close to the road but next to a pretty town. After 11 p.m. it is quieter. You can park all day, no problem. It is two minutes by bus and arrival in Valencia. perfect for misses. leave parked and come back. I've been here for three days and no problems

title: (46013) València - Carrer de Joan Ribera i Belenguer
title_short: (46013) València - Carrer de Joan Ribera i Belenguer
description:
Great spot with 20 min walk to the centre. Calm and safe area! Nearby a Mercadona (5-10 min) and fresh water in the park across the street.
Attention Valencia City Council has issued a decree that prohibits all vehicles of the habitable type, to park in the city, under pain of being verbalized. Motorhomes are tolerated for a time limit not exceeding 24 hours.

address.street: Carrer de Joan Ribera i Belenguer

title: (46013) València - 7 Carrer del Bomber Ramon Duart
title_short: (46013) València - 7 Carrer del Bomber Ramon Duart
description: Little dirt parking in middle of playgrounds next to school. Arrived by one way street and you have to go on sidewalk. I could park with my 6,5m long camper. There is plenty space to turn around.

title: (46013) València - 16 Carrer d'Antonio Ferrandis
description: Parking strips free of charge ideal for cycling into the city. Cycle path directly on along the parking lane. A parking space was still available at 3 p.m. Bus stops along the street.

title: (46035) València - 25 Carrer de la Vall d'Aiora
title_short: (46035) València - 25 Carrer de la Vall d'Aiora
description: It is a dirt parking lot there are gorillas but they help you to park there is no service but it is 5 minutes from the center

title: (46003) València - 11 Carrer d'Alejandra Soler
description: Self-service laundry

title: (46015) València - 35 Calle a Pp Sector 1 Ademuz Pg
title_short: (46015) València - 35 Calle a Pp Sector 1 Ademuz Pg
description: Calle Els Ports that surrounds the back of the Palacio de Congresos, in one of the most modern areas of Valencia. There is usually a place to park during the day (if there is no event at the Palace) if not, it is emptier at night. Street surrounded by parks and in one of them there is a source of drinking water. There are also recycling bins. In the same roundabout you have a huge Repsol station for LPG refilling, washing, shop ... Supermarkets, on-call pharmacies, bars, chic restaurants, ATMs, bazaars, Media Markt, taxi rank, a hospital and even a church within walking distance. stone throw. Empalme tram stop nearby and on the same avenue Cortes Valencianas, Beniferri metro stop and bus 62 that leaves you in the center. Better connection impossible. Stay overnight without problem. At night it is very quiet.

address.street: 35 Calle a Pp Sector 1 Ademuz Pg

title: (46013) Valencia - 1 Carretera de la Anguila
description: Parking for 5/8 campers, even large ones, 10 minutes by electric bicycle from the center. we slept peacefully and without problems for two nights even with a little traffic despite being far from the main street.

title: (46009) València - 50C Plaça Num 29
description: Free dirt city parking. we did not sleep there.

title: (46013) València - 3T UE-1
description: There is always a place in this district. The seats are not large, so van or van. 15 minutes by bike from the center and otherwise tram and bus.

title: (46100) Burjassot - 143C Carretera de Llíria
description: Safe, illuminated, level and quiet site. There's no noise.

title: (46012) València - 533D Carretera Rio
description: Nice wide spot for at least 30 campers. Lots of sun. 200m walk to shops. Close to the sea. Great for one night.

title: (46367) Yátova - 559 Diseminado P009
description: Secluded area where you can spend a relaxing night

title: (46680) Algemesí - Carrer de la Valldigna
description: It is a free service area for motorhomes, to drain gray and black water and fill up with drinking water. Many thanks to the Municipality of Algemesi! There is a quiet place, with a closed area for pets, 1000 meters from the center of Algemesi. Tourist office, museum and basilica apostle jaime. Excellent.

title: (46367) Yátova - Unnamed Road
description: Nature lovers this spot is made for you in the middle of nature by the lake no noise and no passage and magnificent hikes to do

title: (46367) Yátova - 15 CV-429
description: Quiet corner on the side of the road with 2 tables and benches, just for picnicking

title: (46012) Albufera - 552 Carrera del Riu
description: Bus 25 passes right opposite to go to Valencia, highly recommended. Each plot has its electricity. The bathrooms, although we didn't use them, are very good, with showers included in the price, very economical and you have to leave the next morning before noon, otherwise you pay again for a night

name: Casa CariSan
title: (46191) Casa CariSan
description: Parking space in the middle of nature with many orange trees. Chickens and cats roam freely on the premises. The pool can be shared.

name: Camping Valencia el Saler
title: (46012) Camping Valencia el Saler
description: Welcome to the Camping Valencia el Saler Camping Valencia el Saler offers one of the best alternatives in the four seasons of the year, located in the Natural Park of the Albufera (lake, majal, forest and beach) form a unique variety in the Valencian Community to 8 kilometers from the city of Valencia. All this makes our camping a recommendable choice for any visitor, either in search of activities in full nature or visiting the city with the option of using public transport (bus) from the door of the campsite .

name: Camping Park El Saler
title: (46012) Camping Park El Saler
description: Camping Park El Saler is a small camping site with all necessities you need. The facilities are a bit old, but very clean and therefore still nice. It is located close to the bus lines 24 and 25 that take you directly to Valencia centre town. The beach is also in walking distance. Overall a nice place to stay for visiting Valencia!

title: (46100) Burjassot - 25 Carrer de Sant Miquel
description: Parking for long time

title: (46012) València - 353 Carrera Rio
description: Comfortable place to park motorhomes, caravans or boats of any size. Safe, close to the city of Valencia and with a bus stop 300 meters away, beach just 200 meters away.

name: Camping "CollVert"
title: (46012) Camping "CollVert"
description: Camping "CollVert" 200 meters from the sea, along the bike path to Valencia (8 km), quiet and spacious. Services for motorhomes bus in front of the entrance of camping number 25 about 25 minutes to go to the old town which is the terminus

title: (46013) València - 8 Avinguda de l'Alcalde Gisbert Rico
title_short: (46013) València - 8 Avinguda de l'Alcalde Gisbert Rico

Attention Valencia City Council has issued a decree that prohibits all vehicles of the habitable type, to park in the city, under pain of being verbalized. Motorhomes are tolerated for a time limit not exceeding 24 hours.
